actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, to provide that monthly social security benefit payments shall not be considered as income in determining eligibility for pensions under that title.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that monthly social security benefit payments shall not be considered as income in determining eligibility for a veterans, non-service connected disability compensation or, pension. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 503)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, to provide that monthly social security benefit payments shall not be considered as income in determining eligibility for pensions under that title.
